perturbation.original_text: 21.2 Dispute Resolution. If there is a disagreement between the PPI and EKR on the interpretation of this Agreement or any aspect of the performance by either Party of its obligations under this Agreement, the Parties shall resolve the dispute in accordance with the dispute  resolution procedure set out in Schedule VIII.
perturbation.changed_text: 21.2 Dispute Resolution. If there is a disagreement between the PPI and EKR on the interpretation of this Agreement or any aspect of the performance by either Party of its obligations under this Agreement, the Parties shall resolve the dispute in accordance with the most amicable manner possible.
perturbation.explanation: The original text specifies a dispute resolution procedure, while the modified text removes this specification, making the dispute resolution process vague and unenforceable. This violates general contract law principles requiring clarity and specificity in dispute resolution clauses.
perturbation.contradicted_law: General Contract Law - Clarity and Specificity in Dispute Resolution Clauses

perturbation.original_text: 10.6 Insurance. Each Party shall maintain, at its own cost, comprehensive product liability insurance, general commercial liability insurance and business interruption insurance at a level which is reasonable and customary taking into account the nature of the Product but which shall  have combined limits of not less than $[**] per occurrence. Such insurance shall be with a reputable insurance company and where  reasonably possible (taking into account the availability of such insurance) shall be maintained for not less than [**] ([**]) years following  the expiry or termination of this Agreement. During the Term, neither Party shall do or omit to do any act, matter or thing which could  prejudice or render voidable any such insurance. Each Party will provide to the other Party evidence of its insurance and thirty (30) days  prior written notice of any cancellation of its coverage or reduction in coverage from the requirements stated herein.
perturbation.changed_text: 10.6 Insurance. Each Party may choose to maintain, at its own cost, comprehensive product liability insurance, general commercial liability insurance and business interruption insurance at a level which it deems appropriate. Neither Party is obligated to inform the other of the specifics of the insurance. During the Term, each party will attempt to not prejudice or render voidable any such insurance.
perturbation.explanation: The original text mandates insurance coverage with specific limits and notification requirements. The modified text makes insurance optional and removes the notification requirement, significantly reducing the protection for both parties. This violates standard business practices and increases risk, especially given the nature of the pharmaceutical product.
perturbation.contradicted_law: Breach of standard Business practice that mandates insurance coverage for companies.

perturbation.original_text: 20.1 Assignment. Subject to Section 20.2, neither Party shall, nor shall it purport to, assign, license, transfer or change any of its rights or  obligations under this Agreement without the prior written consent of the other, such consent not to be unreasonably withheld  conditioned or delayed; provided, however, that except as provided in Section 20.4 either Party may assign its rights hereunder to an  Affiliate or to any successor by merger, consolidation, sale of stock or other equity interests or the sale of substantially all of the assets of  such Party without the consent of the other Party. For the avoidance of doubt, either Party may grant a security interest with respect to its  rights under this Agreement in connection with a secured financing or similar transaction.
perturbation.changed_text: 20.1 Assignment. Subject to Section 20.2, either Party shall, nor shall it purport to, assign, license, transfer or change any of its rights or  obligations under this Agreement without notifying the other party of the change.
perturbation.explanation: The original text has checks and balances by requiring consent with limitations for assignment, transfer or change any of its rights. The changed text only requires notification which diminishes the power of the other party to ensure compliance and is vague.
perturbation.contradicted_law: Breach of standard Business practice that mandates consent between parties to ensure compliance in agreements.
